detectors.description: pool.claimReward() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xc68633c4c3e226266d50d8ed67d77651a099a0b5-pool.sol#78-112) uses a weak PRNG: random() <= currentRiskChance (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xc68633c4c3e226266d50d8ed67d77651a099a0b5-pool.sol#88)

pool.random() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xc68633c4c3e226266d50d8ed67d77651a099a0b5-pool.sol#145-154) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: seed = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp + block.difficulty + ((uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (block.timestamp)) + block.gaslimit + ((uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (block.timestamp)) + block.number))) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xc68633c4c3e226266d50d8ed67d77651a099a0b5-pool.sol#146-152)
